title: Direct Messaging
desc: Send secure, private messages with end-to-end encryption. Chat one-on-one with friends and family with complete privacy and instant delivery.

title: Group Chats
desc: Create and manage group conversations with real-time messaging. Share media, coordinate events, and stay connected with multiple people at once.

title: Group Streaming
desc: Stream live with friends and communities in high-definition quality. Host watch parties, gaming sessions, or just hang out together online.

title: Social Connections
desc: Build and maintain your social network with easy friend management. Discover new connections and stay in touch with your community.

title: Privacy & Security
desc: Advanced privacy controls and security features protect your conversations and personal information. You control who can contact you and see your activity.

title: Media Sharing
desc: Share photos, videos, and files instantly with your contacts and groups. Express yourself with rich media content in every conversation.
